messages.title: A plan for a fairer Britain
messages.content: The leaflet presents an outline of the Liberal Democrat's vision for a fairer Britain, which includes promises of tax cuts, NHS investment, and educational support.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Lib Dems have delivered a £800 income tax cut for 25 million workers. Now they are campaigning for a further £400 income tax cut.
The Lib Dems are committed to invest £8 billion to ensure the NHS remains a world class service.
The Lib Dem 'Pupil Premium' has delivered £5.5 billion extra for children in schools nationwide to stop children falling behind. They are also campaigning for increased pre-school childcare.

issues.education: The 'Pupil Premium' initiative delivered by the Lib Dems brought in £5.5 billion extra for education.
issues.health: The Lib Dems have a commitment to invest £8 billion in the NHS to maintain its world class service.

images.caption: A plan for a fairer Britain
